text: Include Indigenous seed banks as a central NbS approach.

Outline baseline data to benchmark NBS & hectors of land restored to showcase measurable growth coming out of the implementation of these suggestions. Partner with UNEP/UNEP-WCMC to establish baseline

Include youth initiatives in the Sharm el-Sheikh online portal that have being created based in  decision 3/CP.27 and will be used  to prepare the annual
synthesis report referred to in paragraph 15(a) of decision 3/CP.27
